title: How to Build a School in Africa?! - Thank YOU!!
tags: how to build a school in africa
description: WE DID IT! We raised enough to build an ENTIRE SCHOOL in Africa! Thank you so much. And thank you to the WhatsInside Family for putting this in motion. People from all over the world donated into our 'wedding present' and with many small donations we are able to accomplish big things. Come along with Cambry, Me, Dan and his whole family as we go to Kenya in Africa to see what happens with our donations.   If you want to donate, click the link somewhere around this video.
